plot: After pulling a prostitute from the street, a desperate man's surprising request for something other than sex puts a twist in his already awkward situation.
title: Copper Penny
plot_es: After pulling a prostitute from the street, a desperate man's surprising request for something other than sex puts a twist in his already awkward situation.
plot_en: After pulling a prostitute from the street, a desperate man's surprising request for something other than sex puts a twist in his already awkward situation.
